name: Lemlist Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Lemlist Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Lemlist API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Lemlist API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: activity
available_options: Activity (值: activity)
Campaign (值: campaign)
Enrichment (值: enrich)
Lead (值: lead)
Team (值: team)
Unsubscribe (值: unsubscribe)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add
available_options: Add (值: add)
Delete (值: delete)
Get Many (值: getAll)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: version (值: None)

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: ID of the campaign to unsubscribe the lead from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Name or ID | 作用: ID of the campaign to unsubscribe the lead from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | (必填项)

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date | (必填项)

enrichId.name: enrichId
enrichId.description: ID of the enrichment to retrieve
enrichId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Enrichment ID | 作用: ID of the enrichment to retrieve | (必填项)

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lead ID | (必填项)

findEmail.name: findEmail
findEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Find Email | 默认值: False

verifyEmail.name: verifyEmail
verifyEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Verify Email | 默认值: False

linkedinEnrichment.name: linkedinEnrichment
linkedinEnrichment.natural_language_description: 参数名: LinkedIn Enrichment | 默认值: False

findPhone.name: findPhone
findPhone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Find Phone | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: companyName (值: None) - Company name of the lead to create
companyDomain (值: None) - Company domain of the lead to create
deduplicate (值: None) - Whether to do not insert if this email is already present in another campaign
findEmail (值: None) - Whether to find verified email
findPhone (值: None) - Whether to find phone number
firstName (值: None) - First name of the lead to create
icebreaker (值: None) - Icebreaker of the lead to create
jobTitle (值: None) - Job title of the lead to create
lastName (值: None) - Last name of the lead to create
linkedinEnrichment (值: None) - Whether to run the LinkedIn enrichment
linkedinUrl (值: None) - LinkedIn URL of the lead to create
phone (值: None) - Phone number of the lead to create
picture (值: None) - Picture URL of the lead to create
verifyEmail (值: None) - Whether to verify existing email (debounce)

email.name: email
email.description: Email to delete from the unsubscribes
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email to delete from the unsubscribes
